comment: Mamy w PL ogromn liczb samobjcy i nawet nie wspomnisz zdaniem, tutaj samolot i w jzykach skadasz kondolencje.
amr:
# ::snt Mamy w PL ogromn liczb samobjcy i nawet nie wspomnisz zdaniem, tutaj samolot i w jzykach skadasz kondolencje.
(a / and
      :op1 (p / person
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Mamy")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (p2 / political-party
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "PL")))
            :mod (s / samobjcy
                  :mod (l / liczb)))
      :op2 (n3 / nawet
            :mod (w / wspomnisz))
      :op3 p
      :name (n4 / name
            :op1 "Taj"
            :op2 "Samolot")
      :op4 p
      :name (n5 / name
            :op1 "Jzykach"
            :op2 "skadasz")
      :mod (k / kondolencje))

comment: : My deepest condolences to the families of the victims of the flight that crashed in France.
amr:

(c / condolence
      :poss (ii / i)
      :beneficiary (f / family
            :ARG1-of (v / victimize-01
                  :ARG0 (f2 / fly-01
                        :ARG1-of (c2 / crash-01
                              :location (c3 / country
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "France"))))))
      :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
            :ARG2 (d / deep-02
                  :ARG1 c)
            :ARG3 (m / most)))
